thread.title: Abbey Clancy leads bleary-eyed stars at BRITs afterparties
thread.title_full: Abbey Clancy leads bleary-eyed stars at BRITs afterparties

title: Abbey Clancy leads bleary-eyed stars at BRITs afterparties
text:
Share this article Share Another famous blonde who looked like she'd had a whale of a time was Holly Willoughby, who had shared a snap of her ready as early as the afternoon. Model party girl: No stranger to letting loose at the ceremony, Abbey Clancy looked a world away from her red carpet appearance earlier in the evening as she left the Warner BRITs party at Freemason's Hall Walk this way: Dressed in a tiny asymmetric monochrome dress, she led her husband Peter Crouch and her rocker brother John out of the bash - and appeared somewhat bleary-eyed She ain't heavy, she's my sister! Abbey was helped into the back of a cab by John, who looked like he had enjoyed the evening just as much as his sister Time for bed: With her blonde locks looking slightly dishevelled, she was helped into a taxi by her sibling - while her footballer husband didn't seem too impressed No wonder she needed a drink at the bash - she had been stuck in traffic in a tunnel as she headed to the awards show at the 02 London Arena. Holly party hopped around the Warner and Universal bashes across London with her equally as jolly husband Daniel Baldwin. The pair called it a night in the early hours, before heading home together in a cab. Good golly Miss Holly! Another famous blonde who looked like she'd had a whale of a time was Holly Willoughby, who had shared a snap of her ready as early as the afternoon No wonder she needed a drink at the bash - she had been stuck in traffic in a tunnel as she headed to the awards show at the 02 London Arena Holly party hopped around the Warner and Universal bashes across London with her equally as jolly husband Daniel Baldwin Usually demure and elegant, another seeming victim of the free alcohol on-hand was Christine Bleakley. She attended the show with husband Frank Lampard and started the evening looking chic and stunning in a plunging green blouse. But as she left the Warner afterparty, the Loose Women panelist seemed focused on walking to her car. Girls wanna have fun! Usually demure and elegant, another seeming victim of the free alcohol on-hand was Christine Bleakley Before and after! Christine started the evening looking demure in a green plunging blouse, but the end of the night wasn't such a chic look Another girl who just wanted to have fun was singer Pixie Lott. She danced the night away at the Universal party alongside her fiancé Oliver Cheshire - and the couple seemed in equally high spirits as they finally headed home. Pixie, dressed to the nines in a racy silver minidress, seemed desperate to lie down - and spread out in the back of their car. Letting her hair down! Another girl who just wanted to have fun was singer Pixie Lott Come along! She danced the night away at the Universal party alongside her fiancé Oliver Cheshire - and the couple seemed in equally high spirits as they finally headed home Legs in the air! Pixie, dressed to the nines in a racy silver minidress, seemed desperate to lie down - and spread out in the back of their car The two major parties across town hosted some of the biggest stars in the business. At Soho House Universal teamed up with Bacardi Rum to lay on a lavish bash for the likes of Katy Perry, Ellie Goulding and Nicole Scherzinger. Guests were treated to a surprise DJ set which saw Nick Grimshaw take to the decks. The night's main performer Katy also spun some discs. Winner of the BRIT Award for British Female Solo Artist 2017, Emeli Sandé. Celebrating the best that London has to offer in true style, Mayor Sadiq Khan also attended with wife Saadiya, who arrived early on and chatted to guests throughout the evening. Meanwhile, at the Warner bash, Ciroc vodka was on tap for stars including Mike Skinner, Jodie Harsh, Seb Chew and saw a special DJ set from Dermot O’Leary, fresh from hosting the Awards at the O2.
